title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Crypto Gelato is a decentralized network for developers to deploy automated smart contract executions using bots.The protocol makes bots compatible with most EVM chains such as Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, BSC, etc.It technically helps Blockchain projects outsource their web3 DevOps needs related to automating and relaying transactions.Learn more about Crypto Gelato in our article!
